send(String, Object...) - Method in class bgu.csp.az.api.agt.SimpleAgent
sends a new message the message should have a name and any number of arguments the message will be sent received by an agent in the method that defines @WhenReceived with the name of the message (case sensitive!)

SendbleObject - Class in bgu.csp.az.api.agt
a middle way object used to send a message you should never directly create an instance of this class the usage of this class should be through the method send of simple agent - simpleAgent.send("Message", arg1,...

SimpleAgent - Class in bgu.csp.az.api.agt
SimpleAgent is an agent that uses annotations instead of multiple message objects and manages a major parts of the algorithm tasks by its own.

SimpleMessage - Class in bgu.csp.az.api.agt

start() - Method in class bgu.csp.az.api.Agent

start() - Method in interface bgu.csp.az.api.infra.Process
starts the execution of the inner project this method is a non-blocking one (it started in its own thread) if you want to use a blocking method call the run method

stop() - Method in interface bgu.csp.az.api.infra.Execution
will stop the execution - interupting all the agent runners!
stop() - Method in interface bgu.csp.az.api.infra.Process

str(Collection) - Static method in class bgu.csp.az.api.Agt0DSL

submitCurrentAssignment(int) - Method in class bgu.csp.az.api.Agent
should be used in algorithms that stop on idle detection - using this function the agent can submit its final result and when the idle detector will stop it this is the assignment that will be considered as the final assignment
substract(long) - Method in class bgu.csp.az.api.Statistic

swapPartialAssignmentToFullAssignment() - Method in interface bgu.csp.az.api.infra.Execution
 
SYS_TERMINATION_MESSAGE - Static variable in class bgu.csp.az.api.Agent
the name for the system termination message the system termination message is getting sent only by the abstract agent and if we decide to drop it we should drop that constant too.
